collection.title: Big Bend 2025
collection.description: Dramatic desert vistas and starry skies from Big Bend National Park. Featuring landscapes, wildlife, and astrophotography from this iconic Texas wilderness.
collection.coverImage: Milky Way Over Big Bend - Screen.jpg

images.title: Milky Way Over Big Bend
images.filename: Milky Way Over Big Bend - Screen.jpg
images.description: The Milky Way stretches across the desert sky over Big Bend National Park, showcasing the incredible dark skies of this remote location.

images.title: Tunnel to the Rio Grande
images.filename: Tunnel to the Rio Grande - Screen.jpg
images.description: A natural tunnel carved through desert rock, framing the Rio Grande beyond. A dramatic composition of geological wonder.

images.title: Westward
images.description: Golden hour light illuminates the desert landscape, revealing layers of color and texture in the Big Bend wilderness.

images.title: The Clay Bank
images.description: Rusty clay formations create bold color contrasts against the desert sky, showcasing Big Bend's geological diversity.

images.title: Building in the Chisos
images.description: Historic stone architecture blends with the desert landscape in this portrait of Big Bend's cultural heritage.

images.title: Chisos Scrub Jay
images.description: An endemic bird species of the Chisos Mountains, captured in vibrant blue plumage against the desert landscape.

images.title: Dorgan-Sublett Passage to the Moon
images.filename: Dorgan-Sublett Passage to the Moon - Screen.jpg
images.description: A poetic composition with the moon framed by desert rock formations, capturing the magic of Big Bend's night landscape.
